Description: Calico
* Gun: Decreased Reload time from 3.5 to 3
* Gun: Reduced Clip Size from 18 to 16
* Gun: Increased AltFire Bullet Damage from 6 to 7
* {{PageRef|Sekhmet's Spirit}}: Can now be detonated immediately after cast
* {{PageRef|Sekhmet's Spirit}}: Will only pop up targets that were hit/dragged by the moving cat
* {{PageRef|Nekomata Ward}}: No longer has charges
* {{PageRef|Nekomata Ward}}: Now has a separate 'Attack Range' of 30m
* {{PageRef|Nekomata Ward}}: Duration from 120 to 60
* {{PageRef|Nekomata Ward}}: DPS spirit scaling from 0.4 to 0.3
* {{PageRef|Nekomata Ward}}: Health Spirit Scaling reduced from 3.0 to 2.0
* {{PageRef|Nekomata Ward}}: Removed T2 {{PageRef|Ability}} Charges Bonus and Added +30 {{PageRef|Ability}} Duration Bonus
Holliday
* {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}}: Now properly deals damage in an area on landing
Magician
* Gun: Now properly has damage fall-off
Fathom
* Gun: Damage per pellet reduced from 5 to 4.5
* Gun: Pellet spread increased and falloff start range reduced from 20m to 18m
* {{PageRef|Scalding Spray}}: Updated particle to not obstruct {{PageRef|Fathom}}'s vision, and added a hit effect
* {{PageRef|Breach}}: You can now use other abilities during {{PageRef|Breach}}'s motion
* {{PageRef|Breach}}: Updated particle effects
* {{PageRef|Reefdweller Harpoon}}: You can now perform any action while latched to the wall and it will instantly cancel the latch
Viper
* {{PageRef|Hook}} Dagger has been replaced by Screwjab Dagger
* {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}}: Now targetable only on enemy heroes
* {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}}: Improve VFX
* {{PageRef|Slither}}: Now upgraded by default at level 1.
* {{PageRef|Slither}}: Change T1 upgrade to be +25% Slide distance, T2 to be +2 Stamina, and T3 to be +30% Bullet/Spirit Resistance.
* {{PageRef|Petrify}}: Increase detonation delay from 0.6s â†’ 1.0s
* {{PageRef|Petrify}}: Improve VFX, SFX, and Camera Controls when Petrified
* {{PageRef|Petrify}}: Block amount now scales with Spirit power
* {{PageRef|Petrify}}: Can no longer be cast mid-air
* {{PageRef|Petrify}}: Now is properly blocked by {{PageRef|Unstoppable}}
